ComicInfo.Summary:
Classic Betty and Veronica have enlisted the help of an unexpected friend to combat against the Predator war raging inside the halls of Riverdale High, while new-Riverdale Betty and Jughead are traveling far, far away to fight the good fight right at its source in the conclusion to this epic crossover event!
*Chapter Titles* Chapter One: The Stars My Destination Chapter Two: Boiling Points Chapter Three: Around and Around *List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Robert Hack & Kelly Fitzpatrick | 1 | B | Cover B | Tom Mandrake & Matt Herms | 2 | C | Cover C | Les McClaine | 3 | D | Cover D | Jerry Ordway & Glenn Whitmore | 4 | E | Cover E | Jeff Shultz & Tito Peña | 5 | F | Cover F | Wilfredo Torres & Kelly Fitzpatrick | 6 |
